column4: Hi, my indexing is enabled. previously it becomes annoying eats 100% of processor for indexing 10 folders. how can I know which folders so I may figure what is the problem. ?

if your trying to find what folder is taking so much space, you could download a graphical drive mapper. It shows boxes (by default) of your folders. The boxes are bigger and different colored based on folder size and its contents
I want to know the folders being indexed now, recently I generated many large trace files [part of my research] and I don't want them to be indexed
